StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x45A3_Name
StringTable.String: Proposed Ceasefire Agreement

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x45A3_Desc
StringTable.String: In the shadow of our looming victory, we magnanimously offer you a ceasefire. You will deliver to us a rich bounty of resources and permit a temporary occupation of your capital world. A small price, I assure you, for the luxury of peace under our watchful gaze.

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x45A3_choice_Accept_Desc
StringTable.String: Accept the Ceasefire

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x45A3_choice_Accept_Details
StringTable.String: Agree to the ceasefire terms. This will cost us resources that will be transferred to them and we must endure a military occupation, which could lead to unrest among our citizens.

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x45A3_choice_Reject_Desc
StringTable.String: Reject the Ceasefire

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x45A3_choice_Reject_Details
StringTable.String: Refuse the offer and continue the war.

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x45A3_choice_Accept_Result
StringTable.String: Foreign Occupation.

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x65B4_Name
StringTable.String: Ultimatum for Survival

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x65B4_Desc
StringTable.String: Your existence hangs by a thread. As a species of machines, we are not attached to the petty angers and emotions of organics. Therefore, we offer a ceasefire. In return, half of your income for the next year will be redirected to us. Compliance will halt the war, sparing what remains of your civilization. A weighty tribute, yet trivial against the cost of your annihilation.

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x65B4_choice_Accept_Desc
StringTable.String: Accept the Terms

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x65B4_choice_Accept_Details
StringTable.String: Yield to their demands. Half of our colony income will be transferred to them, buying the fragile semblance of peace and our immediate survival, albeit at a profound economic sacrifice.

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x65B4_choice_Reject_Desc
StringTable.String: We will see you in hell, robot.

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x65B4_choice_Reject_Details
StringTable.String: Reject their terms and prepare for the repercussions. Our integrity is intact, but we face the looming threat of total obliteration."

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x65B4_choice_Accept_Result
StringTable.String: Robotic Subjugation

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x75C5_Name
StringTable.String: Divine Intervention Offer

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x75C5_Desc
StringTable.String: In our infinite compassion, we offer you a path to salvation. The cosmos seeks balance, and your survival requires sacrifice. In exchange for our benevolent ceasefire, we request half of your income and a tribute of Harmony Crystals for the next year. This is not just a demand; it is a spiritual cleansing for your civilization, a chance to harmonize with the universe.

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x75C5_choice_Accept_Desc
StringTable.String: Humble your self for peace

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x75C5_choice_Accept_Details
StringTable.String: Accept their terms, offering a portion of our wealth and Harmony Crystals. Though it strains our resources, it promises a transcendent peace and spares us from further conflict."

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x75C5_choice_Reject_Desc
StringTable.String: Forget it.

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x75C5_choice_Reject_Details
StringTable.String: Refuse their veiled threats and stand against their so-called spiritual guidance. Our freedom remains ours, but the specter of war continues to loom.

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x75C5_choice_Accept_Result
StringTable.String: Spiritual Tribute

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x75D6_Name
StringTable.String: Request for Ceasefire

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x75D6_Desc
StringTable.String: In a humbling realization, we now realize that we wrong to declare war on you. We were mistaken in our aggression and wish to halt this senseless war. In seeking your forgiveness, we ask for a ceasefire and the chance to rectify our wrongs.

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x75D6_choice_Accept_Desc
StringTable.String: Accept a Ceasefire

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x75D6_choice_Accept_Details
StringTable.String: Grant them the ceasefire they seek. Credits or resources will be given to us and taken from them.

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x75D6_choice_Reject_Desc
StringTable.String: The war will continue.

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x75D6_choice_Reject_Details
StringTable.String: Their admission of fault and some credits does not erase the cost of war.

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x75D6_choice_Accept_Result
StringTable.String: Ceasefire

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x86E1_Desc
StringTable.String: Upon careful reflection, we must concede that initiating hostilities was a grave error. We now extend an olive branch, seeking an armistice to end this ill-conceived conflict. We humbly ask for your forgiveness and propose a ceasefire to mend our misguided actions.

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x97F2_Desc
StringTable.String: It seems, rather unexpectedly, that our military campaign has not gone as planned. While we still maintain our dignity, we grudgingly admit a ceasefire might be in order. Let's call it a strategic pause, shall we? For reflection... and stuff.

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0xA8E3_Desc
StringTable.String: In a theatrical turn of events, the tides of war have ebbed against us! We, the once proud aggressors, now find ourselves seeking clemency in the face of adversity. Let us halt these hostilities and weave a new narrative of peace, for the dramatic climax demands it!

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0xB9F4_Desc
StringTable.String: Well, this is awkward. Turns out, declaring war on you wasn't the best idea we've had. Who knew, right? So, how about we forget this little misadventure and call it even with a ceasefire? No hard feelings?

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0xC5F5_Desc
StringTable.String: In the grand tapestry of the cosmos, our war now appears as a mere blemish. A philosophical musing leads us to ponder the futility of conflict. We extend a request for ceasefire, as a step towards universal harmony and a more enlightened path.

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0xD6F6_Desc
StringTable.String: Hey, so we might have jumped the gun a bit with this whole war thing. Turns out, it's not really working out for us. How about we just call a ceasefire and go back to being space neighbors without all the drama?

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0xE7G7_Desc
StringTable.String: In an epic saga of sorrow and regret, we find ourselves lamenting the war we so boldly began. Like a tragic hero, we now seek redemption in the form of a ceasefire, yearning for the sweet release from this burdensome conflict.

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0xF8H8_Desc
StringTable.String: Alright, we admit it - maybe declaring war wasn't our brightest moment. We're not thrilled about it, but let's talk ceasefire. We're kinda done with this whole 'war' thing anyway.

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0xG9I9_Desc
StringTable.String: In an exciting twist of fate, we've decided to view our current situation as an opportunity for growth! We're thinking a ceasefire could be a great way to turn this whole war debacle into a positive learning experience, don't you agree?

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0xH1J1_Desc
StringTable.String: Like a meteor streaking through the night sky, our war efforts have burned bright but brief. In poetic surrender, we seek a ceasefire, hoping to find solace in the tranquil stillness that follows the storm of conflict.

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0xK2L2_Desc
StringTable.String: In our quest for perfection, we calculated many outcomes, but this... this is an anomaly. Your resistance is unexpected, intriguingly flawed yet resilient. I propose a ceasefire â€“ not as a concession, but as an acknowledgment of a fascinating variable in my grand design. Let us pause and analyze, for there is much to learn from this deviation.

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0xL3M3_Desc
StringTable.String: With the benefit of hindsight, which, admittedly, always seems obvious, we've come to realize that starting a war with you might not have been our best idea. It's almost like attacking a civilization full of determined, resourceful beings was a misstep. So, how about we call it a draw and go for a ceasefire? We promise to stick to less disastrous decisions in the future... probably.

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x86E2_Name
StringTable.String: A Plea for Ceasefire

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x86E2_Desc
StringTable.String: We know we are no match for your military power. Will you accept tribute to end this war?

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x86E2_choice_Accept_Desc
StringTable.String: Agree to Ceasefire

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x86E2_choice_Accept_Details
StringTable.String: We accept their plea with money and resources being given to us and removed from them.

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x86E2_choice_Reject_Desc
StringTable.String: Decline their Offer

StringTable.Label: Event_CeaseFire_0x86E2_choice_Accept_Result
StringTable.String: Ceasefire
